SELECT A.CCTN_ID , CASE WHEN B.PGM_NM IS NOT NULL THEN B.PGM_NM ELSE C.TST_CASE_NM END AS CCTN_NM , D.EMPNM AS RGPE_NM , A.RGPE_NO , CASE WHEN A.RGS_DT IS NOT NULL AND A.RGS_DT != '' THEN STR_TO_DATE(A.RGS_DT, '%Y%m%d') ELSE A.RGS_DT END AS RGS_DT , A.MNG_ID , A.ERR_TYCD , A.RGS_DSCD , A.ERR_TXT , G.ORG_FILE_NM AS RGS_ATFL_NM , A.RGS_ATFL_MNG_ID , A.BZCD , A.ERR_PRC_STEP_CD , CASE WHEN A.TTMN_SCD_DT IS NOT NULL AND A.TTMN_SCD_DT != '' THEN STR_TO_DATE(A.TTMN_SCD_DT, '%Y%m%d') ELSE A.TTMN_SCD_DT END AS TTMN_SCD_DT , E.EMPNM AS DVLPE_NM , A.DVLPE_NO , F.EMPNM AS PL_NM , A.PL_NO , CASE WHEN A.TTMN_DT IS NOT NULL AND A.TTMN_DT != '' THEN STR_TO_DATE(A.TTMN_DT, '%Y%m%d') ELSE A.TTMN_DT END AS TTMN_DT , A.TTMN_TXT , H.ORG_FILE_NM AS TTMN_ATFL_NM , A.TTMN_ATFL_MNG_ID , CASE WHEN A.ERR_PRC_STEP_CD = '400' THEN A.BFJR_BZCD ELSE A.BZCD END AS BFJR_BZCD , A.CCTN_BZCD , A.CCTN_ID , A.CCTN_SQN_CD FROM pms_err_mng A LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_pgm_mng B ON B.PGM_ID = A.CCTN_ID AND B.BZCD = A.CCTN_BZCD AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_itg_tst_mng C ON C.TST_CASE_ID = A.CCTN_ID AND C.SQN_CD = A.CCTN_SQN_CD AND C.BZCD = A.CCTN_BZCD AND C.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND C.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info D ON D.EMPNO = A.RGPE_NO AND D.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND D.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info E ON E.EMPNO = A.DVLPE_NO AND E.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND E.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info F ON F.EMPNO = A.PL_NO AND F.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND F.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_atfl_mng G ON G.SQNO = 1 AND G.FILE_RGS_DSCD = '300' AND G.ATFL_MNG_ID = A.RGS_ATFL_MNG_ID AND G.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND G.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_atfl_mng H ON H.SQNO = 1 AND H.FILE_RGS_DSCD = '400' AND H.ATFL_MNG_ID = A.TTMN_ATFL_MNG_ID AND H.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND H.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.MNG_ID = #{mng_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}
